languages.text: Войска, осаждающие Ефрат-II, разобщены, и в их командовании нет единства. Лорд-инквизитор желает, чтобы Вольный Торговец возглавил{mf||а} планирование планетарного штурма.

The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.
languages.original_text: Войска, осаждающие Ефрат-II, разобщены, и в их командовании нет единства. Лорд-инквизитор желает, чтобы Вольный Торговец возглавил{mf||а} планирование планетарного штурма.

traits.locale_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

languages.text: Les troupes qui assiègent Euphrate-II sont divisées et le resteront tant que leurs commandants n'auront pas résolu leur conflit. Le seigneur inquisiteur souhaite que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se charge de planifier l'assaut planétaire à venir.
languages.original_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: Les troupes qui assiègent Euphrate-II sont divisées et le resteront tant que leurs commandants n'auront pas résolu leur conflit. Le seigneur inquisiteur souhaite que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se charge de planifier l'assaut planétaire à venir.

languages.text: 围攻欧夫拉茨二号星的部队陷入了内讧状态。只要指挥官无法达成共识，这场内讧就会继续持续下去。大审判官希望能由行商浪人全权负责接下来的行星围攻战役。
languages.original_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: 围攻欧夫拉茨二号星的部队陷入了内讧状态。只要指挥官无法达成共识，这场内讧就会继续持续下去。审判长希望能由行商浪人全权负责接下来的行星围攻战役。

languages.text: ユーフラテス・IIを包囲している部隊は分裂している。指揮官が対立している限りその状態は続だろうくと思われる。ロード・インクィジターは、来たるべき惑星襲撃の計画立案を自由開拓者に任せたいと思っている。
languages.original_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: ユーフラテス・IIを包囲している部隊は分裂している。指揮官が対立している限りその状態は続だろうくと思われる。ロード・インクィジターは、来たるべき惑星襲撃の計画立案を自由開拓者に任せたいと思っている。

languages.text: Die Truppen, die Eufrates II belagern, sind gespalten. Was auch so bleiben wird, so lange keine Einigkeit zwischen ihren Kommandanten besteht. Der Großinquisitor möchte, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Planung des bevorstehenden Planetenangriffs übernimmt.
languages.original_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: Die Truppen, die Eufrates II belagern, sind gespalten. Was auch so bleiben wird, so lange keine Einigkeit zwischen ihren Kommandanten besteht. Der Großinquisitor möchte, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Planung des bevorstehenden Planetenangriffs übernimmt.

languages.text: Las fuerzas que asedian Eufrates II están divididas y mientras sus comandantes sigan enfrentados la situación no mejorará. El Lord Inquisidor quiere que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se encargue de planificar el asalto al planeta.
languages.original_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: Las fuerzas que asedian Eufrates II están divididas y mientras sus comandantes sigan enfrentados la situación no mejorará. El Lord Inquisidor quiere que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se encargue de planificar el asalto al planeta.

languages.text: Eufrates II'yi kuşatan kuvvetler bölündü ve komutanlarının anlaşmazlığı çözülmediği sürece öyle kalacaklar. Lord Engizisyoncu, yaklaşan gezegen saldırısının planlamasını Hür Tacir'in kontrol etmesini istiyor.
languages.original_text: The forces besieging Eufrates II are divided and will remain that way as long as their commanders are at odds. The Lord Inquisitor wants the Rogue Trader to take charge of planning the upcoming planetary assault.
